description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1ql3i","text":"Inclusion and exclusion criteria for Predicting Cognitive Decline After Spinal Surgery (PROTECT). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
document: {"blocks":[{"key":"qk7q","text":"Selection and Withdrawal of Subjects","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":36},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":36}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9h9b8","text":"Subject Inclusion Criteria","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2hipv","text":"1.Scheduled for non-emergency, non-traumatic spinal surgery","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a1kdi","text":"2.Age ≥65 years","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"61amb","text":"3.MMSE ≥24 at entry","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fohga","text":"4.Able to communicate and understand English language sufficiently to perform cognitive testing","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"36on7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"500q3","text":"Subject Exclusion Criteria","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9q5fd","text":"Pre-existing diagnosis of dementia","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2kf0v","text":"MMSE \u003c24","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"crfre","text":"Inadequate use of English language or significant sensory impairment impacting ability to participate in the assessment and cognitive testing","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24h8d","text":"Lack of informant (family member or close friend) ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1gpcv","text":"Lymphoma, leukaemia, or any malignancy within the past 5 years except for: ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2g6m0","text":"a) Basal cell carcinomas that have been fully resected; or","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3bc4i","text":"b) Squamous epithelial carcinomas of the skin that have been resected with no evidence of metastatic disease for 3 years","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c25br","text":"c) Breast cancer within the past 10 years","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"258i1","text":"Any other serious or uncontrolled health condition (including but not limited to COVID-19) that, in the opinion of the investigator would place the subject at undue risk from the study, impair the ability of the subject to receive protocol-specified therapy, or interfere the study assessments and/or the interpretation of the study","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5rle7","text":"Any psychiatric diagnosis or symptoms (eg, hallucinations, major depression, or delusions) that could interfere with study procedures in the participant","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"75v60","text":"Geriatric Depression Scale (GDS) score ≥8 at Screening","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4m6c6","text":"History of alcohol and/or drug abuse within 2 years of screening","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8u0e9","text":"Poor peripheral venous access","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6913j","text":"Tested PCR COVID-19 positive in last 30 days","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ukbg","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3np7u","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
title: Eligibility Criteria
